name: steepness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of ground) the fact of rising or falling at a sharp angle: The steepness of the terrain is expected to make construction extremely complicated.
(of an amount) the fact of rising or falling very quickly from low to high or from high to low: The steepness of recent price rises has produced many unhappy customers. See
steep
More examplesFewer examplesSpacing between plants will be decided according to the steepness of the slope and the size of trees or plants.The sheer steepness of the stone stairs surprises first-time visitors.After the next corner, there is a marked increase in steepness.We are surprised at the steepness of the fall in demand for new loans.
